subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Devils took what they hope was the first step on that unlikely journey of rallying from a 3-0 deficit to win a best-of-seven series in the Stanley Cup playoffs.
snippet: The Devils took what they hope was the first step on that unlikely journey of rallying from a 3-0 deficit to win a best-of-seven series in the Stanley Cup playoffs.
